titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the South West Pennsylvania and Eureka Pipe Line Companies Records, 1889-1928 AIS.1964.11
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Archives Service Center Staff.

did.unittitle: South West Pennsylvania and Eureka Pipe Line Companies Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Company.

did.abstract: This collection of records pertains to five pipe line companies: Eureka Pipe Line Company, South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Company, Buckeye Pipe Line Company, Cumberland Pipe Line Company, and Southern Pipe Line Company. The collection contains varied forms of ledgers including letter/copy books, financial ledgers, production/inventory ledgers, balance books, check books, and rental ledgers.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of R.L. Lockwood on February 3, 1964.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: South West Pennsylvania and Eureka Pipe Line Companies Records, 1889-1928, AIS.1964.11, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: South West Pennsylvania and Eureka Pipe Line Companies Records, 1889-1928, AIS.1964.11, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: No restrictions; however, users of this collection must make an appointment with the Archives Service Center before the collection can be serviced because of its current physical arrangment.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Andy Newman in November 2004.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: This collection of records pertains to five pipe line companies: Eureka Pipe Line Company, South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Company, Buckeye Pipe Line Company, Cumberland Pipe Line Company, and Southern Pipe Line Company. The earliest records in the collection are those that belong to Eureka (1889). Most of the records detail Eureka's layout of oil pipelines for businesses in Allegheny and the surrounding counties. Essentially Eureka's pipelines were transporting unrefined oil from Oil City, Pa., which was then either used to power factories and farms, or was refined into gasoline for commercial transportation. The company dealt exclusively with the James Brothers' lumber and manufacturing companies.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are organized into seven series:
Series II. Purchase and Collection Reports and Transfers, 1897-1924
Series III. Production, Inventory, and Shipping Ledgers, 1891-1928
Series IV. Balance Books, Check Stub Books, and Vouchers, 1895-1923
Series VI. Contacts and Address Ledgers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Most of the records in the collection, including all of the ledgers, deal with the Eureka and South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Companies. Series VIII deals with the Southern Pipe Line Company. The six record center boxes in Series VIII contain the records of the first four companies mentioned in the history. Located in the boxes are several blueprint maps that show the layout of Pipe Lines in Allegheny County. The collection contains varied forms of ledgers including letter/copy books, financial ledgers, production/inventory ledgers, balance books, check books, and rental ledgers. Additional scope notes are found at the series level.

controlaccess.subject: Petroleum pipelines -- Pennsylvania
Petroleum pipeline industry -- Pennsylvania
Business and Industry
controlaccess.corpname: South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Company.

did.unittitle: Letter/Copy Books

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Series I consists of letter/copy books used by the Eureka Pipe Line Company during the years 1889 to 1924. These contain letters detailing work carried out that accompanied payments to Eureka.

Purchase and Collection Reports and Transfers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains Purchase and Collection Reports and Transfers of the Eureka Pipe Line Company. This type of ledger details the financial status of the company in the transportation of oil, purchase of land, lay of pipe, overall profit, and employee payroll.

Production, Inventory, and Shipping Ledgers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Series III contains records that detail production, shipping and receiving practices of the Eureka Pipe Line Company.

did.unittitle: Loose pages, Eureka P.L. Co., release/hold ledger (shipping/receiving/inventory)
Production List/Inventory-monthly sales/loss, contains blueprint
Consolidated Chemical Co., Kane, Pa. - received/delivered book, transfers
Pool & Material Book (inventory)
Shipping/Receiving Ledger
Invoice copies - many deal with James Bros. Mfg. Co.
Trial Balance Sheets - names include: Kane & Elk R.R. Co., James Mfg. Co., LaMont Chemical Co.
Balance Books, Check Stub Books, and Vouchers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains check stubs, vouchers, and check registers. Vouchers contain check stubs from businesses for the transportation of oil. The record of Gauger's Daily Runs consists of dates, destinations (business or individual), and monies needed or collected. These records are probably those of Eureka's debt collector.

did.unittitle: Balance Book, overall balance of Co. - lists all accounts
Notes and Bills
Consolidated Chemical Co. check stubs
E.E. Collins, Right of Way Department, voucher ledger, Oil City, Pa., Eureka Pipeline Co.
Voucher book
Check stubs
LaMont Chemical Company, Kane Bank & Trust Company, check register
Voucher book
Record of Gauger's Daily Runs (debt/monies collector?)
Rentals

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Series V contains records of the Eureka Pipe Line Company's land rentals in Allegheny and the surrounding counties. Land containing a pipe line with oil flow was essentially owned by the company, and could be rented by companies or individuals.

did.unittitle: Southwest rents and taxes
Eureka Rentals
Southwest Rentals
Contacts and Address Ledgers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes contact and address ledgers of the Eureka Pipe Line Company. These ledgers contain alphabetized names of individuals and businesses also containing contact information.

did.unittitle: Ledger. Alphabetical list of people, businesses, employees, etc. with addresses
Name index book
Material in Boxes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series consists of six record center boxes which contain letters, maps, telegraphs, audits, reports, and balance books. The material is loose within each box and appears to contain no original order or arrangement. The list of records under the box heading is a description of what was found in the box when opened for inspection (the first records seen to the last).

did.unittitle: Hand written letters, maps of pipe line layout, Right of Way contracts, blueprints, indexed telegraphs

physdesc.label: General Physical Description note
physdesc.extent: Contents deals primarily with Buckeye Pipe Line Co.

did.unittitle: Real estate audits/taxes, letters, telegraphs

physdesc.label: General Physical Description note
physdesc.extent: Contains papers from Eureka, 1893-1906 and South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Co., 1903-1915.

did.unittitle: Telegram books from Oil City, telegraphs of South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Co., superintendent's summary of broken lines
Telegraphs, records, blueprints, Right of Way/damage reports, large map, profiles, letters, receipts

physdesc.label: General Physical Description note
physdesc.extent: Contains records from Eureka Pipe Line Co., South West Pennsylvania Pipe Line Co., Pure Oil PL Co., and Cumberland Pipe Line Co.

did.unittitle: Large blueprints, telegram books with name Simmons and Oil City
Ledgers, real estate and tax statements, balance book, report of broken lines and loss of oil, over and short reports
Unprocessed
Unprocessed
Records, vouchers, record for applicant for Right of Way, map

physdesc.label: General Physical Description note
physdesc.extent: Includes materials from Southern Pipe Line Company and Pipe Line. Includes maps of Susquehanna River to Millway Station (Lancaster Count, Pa.); Millway Station east to Chester County, Pa.; Chester County to Point Breeze; Pipe Line, Lower Birmingham Township and Concord Township.
